description: Try our easy to follow Honey-Glazed Apple Doughnuts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Doughnut,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Apple,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Honey-Glazed Apple Doughnuts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cup plain flour, plus 1/3 cup extra
2 tsp raw sugar, to sprinkle (to sprinkle)

recipeInstructions.text: To make the glaze, place honey, cinnamon and cup boiling water in a wide saucepan over medium-high heat and cook, stirring, for 4-5 minutes, or until slightly reduced. Set aside.

Trim tops and bases of apples. Slice each apple into 4 thick rounds. Using a 2cm round cutter, remove cores from each slice. Toss in a bowl with zest and lemon juice and a pinch of salt, and stand for 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, line a baking tray with baking paper. Whisk flour, baking powder, apple juice, egg white and cinnamon in a bowl. Set aside.

Half-fill a large saucepan or wok with oil and heat to 180Â°C or until a cube of bread turns golden in 45 seconds. Working in 4 batches, coat apple slices with extra flour then dip in batter to coat. Lower into oil and cook for 2-3 minutes, turning halfway, or until golden. Remove with a slotted spoon, dip in glaze, then place onto tray.
Serve hot with any remaining glaze and a sprinkling of sugar.
